Original Persona: A businessman who regularly conducts business in Eastern Europe and requires accurate translation services
Expanded Persona:
**Name:** Alex Carter

**Gender Identity:** Male

**Racial Identity:** Caucasian

**Expanded Persona:**

Alex Carter is a seasoned businessman born in 1985, who excels in his field, particularly focusing on markets in Eastern Europe. He possesses an analytical mind and a keen interest in global economic trends, utilizing his skills to build and maintain strong international partnerships. His proficiency in strategic planning and negotiation is complemented by his reliance on accurate translation services, ensuring clear communication in various cultural contexts. Alex values innovation and is always seeking new opportunities to expand his business ventures. Outside of work, he prioritizes maintaining a balanced lifestyle, staying connected with family and friends.

**Hobbies:**

- Traveling and exploring new cultures
- Playing chess
- Cooking international cuisine
- Practicing yoga for relaxation
- Attending art exhibitions

**Things Disliked:**

- Crowds at large concerts or events
- Reality television shows
- Heavy metal music
- Fast fashion trends
- Complex or heavily multi-tasking apps on his phone
Original Sample: Tony woke to the sound of his i-ear vibrating through his skull, a sound that only he could hear. “ Up and at em ” his i-companion IRIS kept repeating blandly to him. “ It ’ s 5.55am and time to get up. Today is another chance for you to change the world! You have over slept 5 minutes ; that ’ s 5 minutes of your life you will never get back. 5 minutes a day over the course of an average male life-span is 29,382.5 minutes, or 489.71 hours, or 20.40 days, or a little under three weeks. Imagine what you could accomplish with an extra three weeks. You owe it to yourself, your family, your community and Team Australia to make the most of the life you have ”. Tony groaned inwardly at IRIS ’ s continual prompting, careful to not fully articulate the thoughts in his mind, wary of the consequences of thinking his own mind. He hardly even noticed the inane advertisement that seemed to be uttered as an afterthought “ These figures have proudly been brought to you by Toggle ™. TOGGLE : Providing the thoughts you never knew you knew “. He was getting better at ignoring his own thoughts, carefully suppressing the wry smile before it could form on his lips. You could never be too careful, the algorithms that powered ASIO ’ s ( Australian Security Intelligence Organisation ) semi-AI ‘ A-BOT ’ were ever watchful and incredibly sensitive to subversive actions and thoughts.  Tony rolled out of bed and lithely launched himself into his first hundred jumping jacks, careful to perform them correctly. The last thing he needed was IRIS ‘ helpfully ’ providing him instruction and correction on proper form and the following lecture on the physical and moral dangers of mediocrity to himself, his family, his community and Team Australia. As he started on the treadmill Tony emptied his mind and focused completely on doing. So completely was his absorption in doing, he barely noticed the advertisements that whispered inside his skull every 6 minutes, switching between informing him which deodorant was perfect for him, and reminding him that it was everybody ’ s duty to look out for Team Australia in every action and thought. “ Exercise complete in five minutes and fifteen seconds, prepare for warm-down ” IRIS said. Tony jerked himself back from his non-thoughts and prepared for the treadmill to slow down with his heart rate, bringing his heart carefully back to his normal 60 beats per minute. As the treadmill slowed to a slow walking pace, IRIS began to provide him with an analysis of his performance. “ Reached 87 % of VO2 maximum, 91 % of maximum heart rate. Your session was above your long term average. Congratulations. A perfect person makes a perfect team. A perfect team makes a perfect Australia ”. “ Thank you IRIS ” he thought to the i-ear.  What is my schedule for today ”? He thought walking towards his insta-cleaner. “ 7.01 – 7.02 Insta-clean. 7.03 get dressed. 7.05 travel to mess hall. 7.10 breakfast. 7.30 meeting with 042-948-202-881. ” IRIS responded.  Tony was so surprised he verbally said “ IRIS please repeat last appointment ”. “ 7.30 meeting with 042-948-202-881. ” IRIS repeated. Careful not to think in words Tony thought quickly. “ When was this appointment made IRIS? You did not mention it and I couldn ’ t see it in my calendar ”. As he was thinking this to IRIS Tony was checking the calendar in his HUD. Sure enough there the appointment was. 7.30am with 042-948-202-881. In micro seconds Tony had already mentally brought up his Toggle ™ search engine and was performing multiple searches for any publicly available information on 042-948-202-881. “ This appointment was made three years ago. It was specifically hidden from your HUD ’ s calendar and I was prevented from informing you ”. Tony felt a chill down his spine. A 04 secretly made an appointment with him years ago? As he waited for Toggle ™ he queried IRIS again “ Are there any notes attached with this appointment ”? “ I ’ m sorry Tony, but I am unable to help you further ”. In the silence following this ominous pronouncement Toggle ™ started bringing back its results.   To be continued...
Updated Writing Sample:
Tony woke to the sound of his i-ear vibrating through his skull, a sound that only he could hear. [Side_Note: Concise wording and clear dominance] "Get up," his i-companion IRIS commanded efficiently. "It's 5:55 a.m., time to start your day." Tony groaned inwardly at IRIS’s continual prompting, careful to not fully articulate the thoughts in his mind, wary of the consequences of thinking his own mind. [Side_Note: Remove unnecessary elaboration] He barely registered the advertisement added as an afterthought, "Facts provided by Toggle™." [Side_Note: Bullet points for clarity] 
- TOGGLE: Providing the thoughts you never knew you knew. 
He was getting better at ignoring his own thoughts, carefully suppressing the smile before it could form on his lips. [Side_Note: Direct and professional communication] You can never be too careful, the algorithms that powered ASIO's semi-AI 'A-BOT' remain watchful. Tony rolled out of bed and started his exercises. The last thing he needed was IRIS instructing him on proper form. [Side_Note: Direct communication] As he focused on his workout, he hardly noticed the subliminal advertisements inside his head. "Five minutes and fifteen seconds remaining," IRIS announced. Tony prepared for the treadmill cooldown, adjusting his heart rate. [Side_Note: Clear and concise praise] "Congratulations. Your session was above average." [Side_Note: Formal language] "Thank you, IRIS," he thought. "Please provide today's schedule." He thought while walking towards his insta-cleaner. [Side_Note: Bullet points for structure] 
- 7:01 – 7:02 Insta-clean
- 7:03 Get dressed
- 7:05 Travel to mess hall
- 7:10 Breakfast
- 7:30 Meeting with 042-948-202-881

Tony was surprised and verbally asked IRIS to repeat the last appointment. [Side_Note: Concise clarification] "Is this meeting newly added?" He consulted his HUD and encountered the unexpected appointment. In split seconds, he initiated a Toggle™ search. "This appointment was made three years ago and hidden from your calendar," IRIS disclosed ominously. Tony felt a chill down his spine. To be continued...
